headline: Oracle's blockbuster surge shows AI trade's growing influence on market
summary: (Reuters) -Wall Street's "AI trade" has propelled the market to record highs this year, and Oracle's stunning share-price gains are giving investors another reason to back the trade.  Oracle shares jumped 36% on Wednesday after the company pointed to a demand surge from AI firms for its cloud services.  The surge lifted its market value to $922 billion, leapfrogging the values of Eli Lilly LLY.N, JPMorgan Chase JPM.N and Walmart WMT.N.

raw.headline: Oracle's blockbuster surge shows AI trade's growing influence on market
raw.summary: (Reuters) -Wall Street's "AI trade" has propelled the market to record highs this year, and Oracle's stunning share-price gains are giving investors another reason to back the trade.  Oracle shares jumped 36% on Wednesday after the company pointed to a demand surge from AI firms for its cloud services.  The surge lifted its market value to $922 billion, leapfrogging the values of Eli Lilly LLY.N, JPMorgan Chase JPM.N and Walmart WMT.N.
